sentences.en: After three days of'spinning , " the fires were extinguished.
I looked at it see the lantern spinning you have a lot of beautiful patterns through the lights out we see on the outside like fly.
sentences.cn: 我仔细观察了一下看到走马灯不停地旋转着你面有很多漂亮的图案通过灯光照射出来我们在外面看就象走马观花一样。

sentences.en: If you have vertigo it seems as if the whole room is spinning round you.
sentences.cn: 如果你头晕，就会觉得整个房间都旋转起来。

sentences.en: Like Tony Montana on his toes. Up up and down your spinning round and round.
sentences.cn: 歌词大意： 像托尼蒙大拿州在他的脚趾上。向上向上和向下你旋转圆和圆。

sentences.en: Louisa was dancing, spinning by herself, her skirt flying out and coiling around her feet.
sentences.cn: 路易莎打着圈儿翩翩起舞，裙摆时而肆意飞扬，时而盘绕脚边。

sentences.en: My head was spinning from the wine.
sentences.cn: 我喝了葡萄酒后晕乎乎的。

sentences.en: Spinning is one of my hobbies.
Stars appeared everywhere, spinning round and round, faster and faster.
sentences.cn: 满眼金星乱转，而且越转越快。

sentences.en: The car was spinning along the highway.
The carriage was spinning along at a good speed.
The heavy blow sent the enemy spinning to the ground.
sentences.cn: 猛烈的一击打得敌人昏头转向,倒在地上.

sentences.en: The plane was spinning out of control.
sentences.cn: 飞机失去控制，不停地旋转。

sentences.en: The spinning top was losing momentum.
sentences.cn: 旋转的陀螺正在失去动量.

sentences.en: The spinning turbine creates a vacuum.
sentences.cn: 旋转的涡轮形成了一块真空区域。

sentences.en: They do their own cooking, spinning, and woodworking.
sentences.cn: 他们自己做饭，纺线，做木工活。

words.tran_cn: 纺纱机；纺纱工人；旋床工人；旋式诱饵

phrases.tran_cn: 徘徊；天旋地转；旋转起舞

trans.tran_en: the act or process of spinning

trans.tran_cn: 使…旋转( spin的现在分词 )，纺（线），杜撰，（使）急转身
